name: Tesla Force
overview: With science as your superpower, team up with Tesla, Curie, Lovecraft, and Shelley to save the world from an invasion of cosmic horrors. Tesla Force is an intense, procedurally generated, rogue-lite top-down shooter packed with non-stop mayhem and over-the-top power tripping. * Ridiculously over-the-top mayhem and power trips * Endlessly replayable rogue-lite gameplay * Randomly generated levels * A wild array of devastating weapons * Deadly scientific gadgets to help you mow down the abominations * A multitude of crazy perks to customize your character * Over a dozen unique Lovecraftian horrors and boss monsters to defeat * Play as Nikola Tesla, Marie Curie, H.P. Lovecraft, or Mary Shelley.
